sentences.en: And of course they electronically will have your information.
sentences.cn: 而且当然他们电子地将会有你的数据.

sentences.en: E - mail allows users to electronically transmit and receive messages, text, or data.
sentences.cn: 电子函件使用户可以用电子手段传递和接收消息 、 文本和数据.

sentences.en: Electronically via the Internet, provided a record of its transmission is available.
sentences.cn: 在能获得传送记录的情况下,通过网络以电子形式传送.

sentences.en: Experience of an electronically stock controlled environment essential. Experience of ERP System.
sentences.cn: 有使用电子库存管理系统和使用ERP系统的经验.

sentences.en: In the car peak torque is limited electronically to 1,100 Nm.
sentences.cn: 在汽车峰值扭矩被电子限制在1,100米.

sentences.en: Maintains and updates sales records manually and electronically as required.
sentences.cn: 手工或是用电脑保留和更新销售记录.

sentences.en: Molecules excited electronically, are unstable relative to the ground state.
sentences.cn: 相对于基态来说,电子被激发了的分子是不稳定的.

sentences.en: Other readings to be out in class or electronically.
sentences.cn: 其他阅读资料将用电子邮件分发或者在课堂上直接发.

sentences.en: Starters were decided by fan balloting at NBA arenas and electronically.
sentences.cn: 首发球员的名单是由球迷通过NBA球馆和网上投票产生.

sentences.en: The bank where the payer has his account can then make the payment electronically.
sentences.cn: 付款人的开户行随即利用电脑付款.

sentences.en: The electronically control unit includes hardware, software and calibration data.
sentences.cn: 电控单元包括硬件电路 、 控制软件以及标定数据三个部分.

sentences.en: The information is electronically transmitted to schools and colleges.
sentences.cn: 信息通过电子方式传送到各所学校和学院。

sentences.en: The information is electronically transmitted to schools and colleges…
sentences.cn: 信息通过电子方式传送到各所学校和学院。

sentences.en: Tonality depends on the reflected brightness of the terrain and can be electronically measured.
sentences.cn: 色调依赖于地质体反射的亮度,利用电子设备可以测量出来.
